column1: Description: Government spending per person, 2011 PPP$, net of general budget support ODA and disbursements on debt to the public sector
Source: Development Initiatives calculations based on IMF World Economic Outlook, OECD DAC and World Bank

Calculated from IMF WEO data on government spending as a proportion of GDP. Receipts of general budget support ODA and disbursements on public debt are subtracted from total government spending before dividing by the population, to avoid double counting when comparing with international resource flows.
On the 'Data-wide' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are only from the 'value' column.
